Part - III: (Defect Details)
a) Defect Category: Observation
b) Defect Observed: Pressure regulator drift. Defect found during scheduled maintenance.
Part IV: Investigation: (Details of Examination including previous similar Defects)
a) Root Cause Analysis: Foreign object damage to critical surface
b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Bleed Air System component. Functional
testing confirmed the reported anomaly.
c) Remedial Measures Repair damaged area using approved repair scheme
i. Corrective Action:
ii. Preventive Action: Implement condition-based monitoring system
d) Attributable Code: M - Other Reasons
Remarks: Complete defect analysis performed. Lessons learned documented.
Part V: Remarks by Design
Design review completed. No design modification required. Component replacement as per maintenance manual is adequate.
Date: 09/12/2023 Authorized Signatory of Design: Wg Cdr B.P. Gupta
